title: Riot Comments dissapearing from Red Tracker
body: So actually  whenever i go to Red Tracker page, Some newest comments dissapear. Unless i refresh, they will appear for a second.

replies.body: This is being caused by a script we're running to organize the red tracker better, and not include a spam of our posts here on H&S.  Here's a [scriptless version](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker?)!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=790vidu6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-30T18:47:01.070+0000)
>
> This is being caused by a script we're running to organize the red tracker better, and not include a spam of our posts here on H&S.  Here's a [scriptless version](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker?)!

The Scriptless version isn't working now...

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=790vidu6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-30T18:47:01.070+0000)
>
> This is being caused by a script we're running to organize the red tracker better, and not include a spam of our posts here on H&S.  Here's a [scriptless version](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker?)!

Thanks!
I went to this scriptless version but now I can't go back to the regular version. Helppp how do I filter again.
